sols_html:
The questions asks for when \(f_{av} = 0\). Plugging this into the formula in the hint gives

\[\begin{aligned} f_{av} &= \frac{1}{b-0}\int_{0}^{b} (3x^{2}-6x + 2 )\, dx \\ &= \frac{1}{b}\left.x^{3} - 3x^{2} + 2x \right|_{0}^{b}\\ &= \frac{1}{b}(b^{3} - 3b^{2} + 2b)\\ &= b^{2} - 3b + 2\\ &= (b-2)(b-1)\end{aligned}\]

and so we have that \(b = 1\) or \(b=2\) completing the question.
